Metadata.Name: S3'14-like Knuckles AIZ Intro
Metadata.Author: Raine (nabbup)
Metadata.Description:
A near perfect recreation of Knuckles' intro seen in the 2014 Sonic 3 Proof of Concept made by Christian Whitehead and Stealth.
Level chunks replicated (and edited) using the Sonic 3'14 Project as reference.
Compatibility is unknown with most level mods. Disable this mod if there are apparent issues while it's in use.
